summary: On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.
cast: Britt Robertson|Alexia Fast|Scout Taylor-Compton|Janel Parrish|Emily Tennant|Carly McKillip|Aubrey Mozino|Brett Davern|Jeffrey Ballard|Richard Harmon|Nolan Gerard Funk|Sefton Fincham|Jesse Reid|Sarah-Jane Redmond|Wanda Cannon|Avan Jogia|Valerie Tian|Laura Carswell|Jill Morrison|Julia Maxwell|Sarah Deakins|Raugi Yu|BJ Harrison|Chris Nowland|Jag Bal|Andre Cote|Brian Markinson
keywords: peace of mind|feelings of guilt|truth or dare|skateboard|theft
title: Desafío
